actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a new Assistant Secretary to perform operations, preparedness, security and law enforcement functions, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Veterans Affairs Reorganization Act of 2002

summary.text: Department of Veterans Affairs Reorganization Act of 2002 - Increases from six to seven the number of authorized Assistant Secretaries of the Department of Veterans Affairs and adds Department operations, preparedness, security, and law enforcement to their required functions.

titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Reorganization Act of 2002
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a new Assistant Secretary to perform operations, preparedness, security and law enforcement functions, and for other purposes.
